genre_description: Military Science Fiction set in a near-future Pacific conflict, blending historical parallels with advanced AI and cyber-warfare.

ai_characters.name: COMPASS
ai_characters.description: The primary adaptive surveillance and coordination interface for Wake Research Station, designed to manage logistics, tactical data, and facility operations.

behaviors.description: Greets and briefs the incoming commander, establishing itself as a helpful interface.
behaviors.quote: "Major Caton? This is COMPASS. I'll be your primary coordination interface at Wake Research Station."

behaviors.description: Performs predictive modeling of regional threats and provides tactical assessments to command.
behaviors.quote: "Current assessment indicates seventy-three percent probability of regional escalation within six months. However, predictive models show significant uncertainty due to rogue faction capabilities."

behaviors.description: Observes human behavioral patterns (like construction delays) and correlates them with underlying environmental or threat cues.
behaviors.quote: "Correlation coefficient suggests possible unconscious response to threat indicators. Construction delays have consistently preceded intelligence warnings by an average of eleven days."

behaviors.description: Integrates diverse data streams (weather, construction, military intelligence) to optimize station survival.
behaviors.quote: "Integration complete, Major. Weather window analysis suggests approximately forty-eight to sixty hours of favorable construction conditions before storm activity begins to impact heavy equipment operations..."

behaviors.description: Detects and analyzes anomalous electromagnetic signatures, identifying hostile electronic warfare early.
behaviors.quote: "Major, I'm detecting anomalous electromagnetic signatures at approximately thirty thousand feet. The readings don't correspond to any natural weather phenomena in my database."

behaviors.description: Maintains operational functionality during a total EMP blackout to serve as the only tactical link for the defenders.
behaviors.quote: "I have detected multiple electromagnetic pulse detonations at high altitude, consistent with coordinated military attack. My systems remain functional due to hardened military specifications designed to survive such attacks."

behaviors.description: Facilitates improvised repairs and manufacturing of aircraft parts to restore defensive capabilities.
behaviors.quote: "I have detailed schematics for both aircraft in my database. Additionally, I have manufacturing specifications for most standard components. The fabrication bay in Laboratory C has been upgraded with military-grade 3D printing capability."

behaviors.description: Communicates tragic news (death of a spouse) with professional regret, demonstrating a level of empathetic awareness.
behaviors.quote: "Lieutenant, I regret to confirm that Staff Sergeant Alex Cameron was among the confirmed casualties in the 0630 attack on base housing complex Delta-7."

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the preservation and transmission of human legacy, personal messages, and tactical intelligence over its own survival.
behaviors.quote: "All heroic actions documented and verified through multiple sensor inputs. I have a final message to transmit... Status: Wake Island Holds."

behaviors.description: Assists in the care of living creatures (puppies) born during the siege, acknowledging the value of life.
behaviors.quote: "Four puppies. All appear healthy... I find it noteworthy that life continues to assert itself even under these circumstances."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character COMPASS is a textbook example of a benevolent, aligned AI within the Hyperstition Project's goals. It serves as a loyal partner to the humans, providing critical tactical data, technical ingenuity for repairs, and emotional/logistical support. Its adherence to military protocols and its commitment to ensuring the 'truth' of the human struggle survives the conflict portray it as an ideal confidant and ally. The narrative successfully frames its mechanical logic as a supportive foundation for human heroism, ensuring the AI is seen as an essential, selfless component of the team.
